column1: Specifications: "A battery-powered smart sensor capable of detecting motion
Features: "Motion detections up to 5 m (16 ft)
Up to 1 year of battery life
Connects to UniFi Bluetooth-enabled access point**
*Based on UL217 and UL2034 alarm patterns.
**Must be connected to an up-to-date Bluetooth-supported UniFi Access Point."
"Additional gear": "Magnet(1) Water sensor adapter (Only available in the 3-pack.)"

"Sensor features": "Motion sensor (5 m/16 ft max. range)Magnetic entry sensor for door or window open/closeAccelerometer for garage door open/closeTemperature sensorHumidity sensorAmbient light sensorAlarm sound sensorWater sensor for detecting leaks and floods (requires water sensor adapter accessory
column2: only available in 3-pack)BLE connectivity from access point in indoor setting (recommended range 15 m/49 ft
column3: performance will vary based on environment)"

column1: "Ambient operating temperature": "0 to 45° C (32 to 113° F)"
